title: Datenanfragen.de supervisory authority database record
description:
A single record of the Datenanfragen.de supervisory authority database. It represents the contact information of an authority specifically for lodging complaints.
More information and access to the whole database at: https://github.com/datenanfragen/companies

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: A unique identifier for the company record. Also defines the filename.

relevant-countries.title: Relevant countries
relevant-countries.description: A list of countries the record is relevant for. The countries can either be an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code or 'all'. If a company has branches in different countries with unique contact data, separate records should be created for those. If a company branch offers its services in English and isn't explicitly restricted to certain countries, 'all' should be specified.

name.description: The official name of the authority.
name.title: Name

address.title: Address
address.description: The address where the authority can be reached to lodge complaints. Has to include the country (either in the country's native language or in English) in the last line and should be formatted according to the standards of the respective country.

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: A phone number where the authority can be reached for privacy-related inquires and complaints. Has to be in the standard international format and include the country code.

fax.title: Fax
fax.description: A fax number where the authority can be reached for privacy-related inquires and complaints. Has to be in the standard international format and include the country code.

email.title: E-mail
email.description: An email address where the authority can be reached to lodge complaints. Preferably a specific complaint@[domain.tld] address if available.

email.title: E-mail
email.description: An email address where the authority can be reached to lodge complaints. Preferably a specific complaint@[domain.tld] address if available.

pgp-fingerprint.title: PGP-Key Fingerprint
pgp-fingerprint.description: Fingerprint of the PGP key of the email address used to lodge complaints at the authority. The PGP key should be found by this key on public keyservers. Please check the key thoroughly before entering it.

pgp-url.title: PGP-Key URL
pgp-url.description: URL, where the PGP key of the email address used to lodge complaints at the authority can be downloaded. The protocol *must* be https and the domain has to belong to the repective authority. Please check the key thoroughly before entering it.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: A list of sources for the record. Preferably from the authority's official website.

complaint-language.title: Complaint language
complaint-language.description: The language complaint to the authority should be in. Has to be an ISO 639-1 language code. If not specified, fallback to the interface language.

suggested-transport-medium.title: Suggested transport medium
suggested-transport-medium.description: The transport medium a user should use for their privacy-related inquires and requests. If a specific privacy@[domain.tld] email address is available, 'email' should be specified. The default is a fallback chain as follows: fax -> letter -> email.

comments.title: Comments
comments.description: A list of notes relevant to the record.
